name: Conflict (itch) (GmaxGames)
description:
Conflict is a free-to-play Grand Strategy game. Take charge of a nation and build an empire!

Getting Started:

Read the How To slides for instructions

Click on New Game

Pick a country (Choose Madagascar if you want to just observe)

Enter a surname and pick an ideology

Cheats:

Press tab to open the command line.

To make a country declare war on another country, type the names of the two countries divided by a comma e.g. "USA,Canada". Be sure to use the in-game name (case-sensitive).

To add money to your country, type the number of funds you would like to add.

Press enter to enter the command.

Have fun!

(Please note, this game is in beta and any feedback is gratefully received)
